page.title: 11Traffic Surveys
page.content:
{ Transport, Traffic Survey, Pembury.}
1.How frequently do you travel through Pembury by road? (a)Daily (b)Twice a week (c)Once a week (d)Less than once a week. 2.How do you travel? (a)Bike (b)Car (c)Van (d)Bus. 3.Do you think Pembury has a traffic problem? 4.At what time of day do you travel through Pembury? 5.The by-pass will cost over Â£10 million. Do you think this cost is justified? 6.Who do you think will benefit most from the by-pass? 7.Do you think that when the by-pass is built, more people will come to shop?
